name: Edge of Entropy
description:
A charming, rogue-like strategy game where you play Ell the Elementalist, attempting to power up the Elemental Islands to create a new universe. Be careful! The more you move around the islands, the more entropy is generated in the Chaos Cat’s belly, until he throws shards of entropy at your islands undoing your hard work.

Earn fortune, power your islands, create a universe, and watch out for that cat!
